mapper.select:
select pole.*,unit.UnitName as unitname,d1.Item as statusname,d2.Item as typename,linedetail.LineDetailId as childlinedetailid,linedetail.LineId as childlineid,linedetail.PoleId as childpoleid,linedetail.`Name` as childname,linedetail.`Code` as childcode,linedetail.PrePoleId as childprepoleid,linedetail.Memo as childmemo from pole LEFT JOIN dicitem d1 ON pole.`Status`=d1.DicItemId LEFT JOIN dicitem d2 ON pole.Type=d2.DicItemId LEFT JOIN linedetail ON pole.PoleId=linedetail.PoleId LEFT JOIN unit ON pole.UnitId=unit.UnitId
WHERE pole.PoleId in (SELECT linedetail.PoleId from linedetail WHERE linedetail.LineId=#{lineid})
select COUNT(*) from linedetail WHERE linedetail.LineId=#{lineid}

select powerline.`Name` as linename,pole.*,linedetail.LineId as childLineId,linedetail.`Name` as childname,linedetail.Code as childCode,linedetail.Memo as childMemo,linedetail.LineDetailId as childdetailid,linedetail.PrePoleId as childprepoleid,pline.`Name` as childLinename,d1.Item as statusname,d2.Item as typename,unit.UnitName as unitname from pole LEFT JOIN dicitem d1 ON pole.`Status`=d1.DicItemId LEFT JOIN dicitem d2 ON pole.Type=d2.DicItemId LEFT JOIN linedetail on linedetail.PoleId=pole.PoleId LEFT JOIN powerline on powerline.LineId=linedetail.LineId LEFT JOIN unit on pole.UnitId=unit.UnitId LEFT JOIN powerline as pline ON pline.LineId=linedetail.LineId WHERE pole.PoleId=#{poleid}
select * from linedetail where linedetail.name like "%"#{name}"%" and LineDetail.PoleId in (SELECT hangdetail.PoleId FROM hangdetail)
select * from linedetail where linedetail.name=#{name} and LineDetail.PoleId in (SELECT hangdetail.PoleId FROM hangdetail)
mapper.insert: insert into pole (UnitId, Code, Name, CreateTime, Longtitude, Latitude, PositionMethod, Height, Type, Status, Memo) values (#{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeString,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{longtitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{positionmethod,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{height,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update pole set Longtitude = #{longtitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where PoleId = #{poleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.delete: DELETE pole.*,linedetail.*,hangdetail.* from pole LEFT JOIN linedetail ON pole.PoleId=linedetail.PoleId LEFT JOIN hangdetail on pole.PoleId=hangdetail.PoleId where pole.PoleId=#{poleid}
mapper.update: UPDATE pole LEFT JOIN hangdetail ON pole.PoleId=hangdetail.PoleId LEFT JOIN linedetail ON pole.PoleId=linedetail.PoleId SET linedetail.PrePoleId=NULL,hangdetail.PrevPoleId=NULL WHERE pole.PoleId=#{poleid}
mapper.insert: insert into pole (PoleId, UnitId, LineId, Code, Name, CreateTime, Longtitude, Latitude, PositionMethod, Height, Type, Status, Memo) values (#{poleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{longtitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{positionmethod,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into pole
PoleId,
UnitId,
LineId,
Code,
Name,
CreateTime,

Latitude,

Height,
Type,

Memo,

mapper.update:
update pole
UnitId = #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LineId = #{lineid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Longtitude = #{longtitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PositionMethod = #{positionmethod,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
Height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PoleId = #{poleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update pole set UnitId = #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LineId = #{lineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Longtitude = #{longtitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PositionMethod = #{positionmethod,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Height = #{height,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, Type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PoleId = #{poleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
